titleStmt.title: Two new playes ... written by Tho. Middleton, Gent.
titleStmt.author: Middleton, Thomas, d. 1627.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Humphrey Moseley, and are to be sold at his shop ...,

notesStmt.note: The second play has special t.p.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
More dissemblers besides women -- Women beware women.
